Package doa.engine.scene

Scene, scene object and builders.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DoaFixedObject
    DoaObjects implementing this interface are moved from world-space to screen-space.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaComponent  
    DoaObject
    Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will be processed by DoaEngine must either be this class, or its sub-classes.
    DoaObjectBuilder<T extends DoaObject> Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    This class and all of its functionality has been deprecated and will be removed at some future date.
    DoaScene
    Responsible for keeping DoaObjects.
    DoaSceneHandler
    Class is for loading-unloading scenes to DoaEngine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DoaObjectInstantiationException Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    This exception and all of its functionality has been deprecated and will be removed at some future date.
